sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhège xiāoxi chuánbiàn le quánguó.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette nouvelle s'est répandue dans tout le pays.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This news spread throughout the country.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā qiú wǒ bāngmáng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il m'a demandé de l'aide.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He asked me for help.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他是一个有理想的青年。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì yī gè yǒu lǐxiǎng de qīngnián.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est un jeune homme avec des idéaux.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a young man with ideals.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ měitiān kàn Rénmín Rìbào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je lis le Quotidien du Peuple chaque jour.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I read the People's Daily every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhèxiē rìzi guò de hěn kuài.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ces jours passent très vite.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: These days pass very quickly.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ rènwéi zhège fāngfǎ hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je pense que cette méthode est très bonne.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I think this method is very good.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 参加活动的人数超过了一百人。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Cānjiā huódòng de rénshù chāoguò le yībǎi rén.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le nombre de participants à l'activité a dépassé cent personnes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The number of participants exceeded one hundred.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ xǐhuan shénmeyàng de yīnyuè?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quel genre de musique aimes-tu ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What kind of music do you like?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shàng zhōu wǒ qù le Běijīng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La semaine dernière, je suis allé à Pékin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Last week I went to Beijing.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de shēngyīn hěn hǎotīng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Sa voix est très agréable.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Her voice is very pleasant.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shànghǎi shì Zhōngguó zuìdà de shì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Shanghai est la plus grande ville de Chine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Shanghai is the largest city in China.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ shífēn gǎnxiè nǐ de bāngzhù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je te suis très reconnaissant pour ton aide.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I am very grateful for your help.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Qǐng zhèngquè shǐyòng zhè tái jīqì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez utiliser cette machine correctement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please use this machine correctly.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这块手表是我爸爸送的。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè kuài shǒubiǎo shì wǒ bàba sòng de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette montre est un cadeau de mon père.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This watch was a gift from my father.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de Zhōngwén shuǐpíng hěn gāo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Son niveau de chinois est très élevé.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His Chinese level is very high.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 我想提高我的口语能力。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xiǎng tígāo wǒ de kǒuyǔ nénglì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je veux améliorer mes compétences orales.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to improve my speaking ability.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuan tǐyù kè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'aime le cours d'éducation physique.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I like physical education class.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ lèi le, suǒyǐ xiǎng xiūxi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je suis fatigué, donc je veux me reposer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I'm tired, so I want to rest.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tàiyáng cóng dōngbiān shēngqǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le soleil se lève à l'est.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The sun rises in the east.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 体育馆里有很多人在运动。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tǐyùguǎn lǐ yǒu hěn duō rén zài yùndòng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a beaucoup de gens qui font du sport dans le gymnase.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There are many people exercising in the gymnasium.
